mapper.select: SELECT pr.pr_id, pr.serial_code, fp.name as product_name, pr.to_company, pr.target_qty, pr.planned_qty, pr.completed_qty, pr.unit, pr.request_date, pr.deadline, pr.production_start_date, pr.end_date, pr.note FROM Production_Request pr LEFT JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON pr.serial_code = fp.serial_code

SELECT pr.pr_id, pr.serial_code, fp.name as product_name, pr.to_company, pr.target_qty, pr.planned_qty, pr.completed_qty, pr.unit, pr.request_date, pr.deadline, pr.production_start_date, pr.end_date, pr.note FROM Production_Request pr LEFT JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON pr.serial_code = fp.serial_code WHERE pr.end_date IS NULL
AND fp.name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY
pr.request_date pr.deadline fp.name pr.request_date
DESC ASC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Production_Request pr LEFT JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON pr.serial_code = fp.serial_code WHERE pr.end_date IS NULL
AND fp.name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT pr.pr_id, pr.management_employee, pr.production_employee, fp.name as product_name, pr.to_company, pr.target_qty, pr.unit, TO_CHAR(pr.deadline, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as deadline, TO_CHAR(pr.production_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as production_start_date, TO_CHAR(pr.request_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as request_date, TO_CHAR(pr.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date FROM Production_Request pr LEFT JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON pr.serial_code = fp.serial_code WHERE 1=1
AND (fp.name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR pr.to_company LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
ORDER BY
pr.pr_id pr.management_employee fp.name pr.to_company pr.target_qty pr.deadline pr.end_date pr.pr_id
DESC ASC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Production_Request pr LEFT JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON pr.serial_code = fp.serial_code WHERE 1=1
AND (fp.name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR pr.to_company LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')

SELECT pr.pr_id, pr.management_employee, pr.production_employee, pr.serial_code, fp.name as product_name, pr.to_company, pr.target_qty, pr.planned_qty, pr.completed_qty, pr.unit, TO_CHAR(pr.request_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as request_date, TO_CHAR(pr.production_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as production_start_date, TO_CHAR(pr.deadline, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as deadline, TO_CHAR(pr.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date, pr.note FROM Production_Request pr LEFT JOIN Fixed_Product fp ON pr.serial_code = fp.serial_code WHERE pr.pr_id = #{prId}
